All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Application
our class to save the data of our application
ApplicationController
class to do the works of on our objects and pass it back to view
ApplicationController.Sort
class to sort our application base on names
ApplicationMenu
our application menu to pass the request to our controller and print the result in the console
CommandProcessor
this is where our program comes when it starts
CustomerController
class to do the works of on our objects and pass it back to view
CustomerMenu
when user it comes here and do the works they want
DeveloperController
class to do the works of on our objects and pass it back to view
DeveloperMenu
when developer it comes here and do the works they want
LoadController
a class to load the objects from our file to use them in program.
Main
this project is build on MVC structure (MODEL/VIEW/CONTROLLER).
Records
a class to save and load our serializable object, so we can use them later after rerunning our program.
RegisterController
class to do the signup and login process of user or developer
StartProgram
our controller that works with command line and call it.
SystemInfo
where we keep data of all users and applications that was made by Developers also we implement Serializable to save the information we want in our file to have them even after rerunning our program.
User
our model class is for saving information of our users like name , username,...
